title: Account hacked > Hacker verified his own email > used my cc to purchase $300 RP.
body:
Riot support have been very slow in terms of replying, so I thought I'd post here in hope that someone else associated with Riot may be able to assist faster.

As the title says, my account has indeed been compromised and right now, I'm posting from an alternative account. The user has verified his email onto my account (i forgot to verify) and through this, was able to then buy $300 worth of RP that has been charged straight to my credit card. Do you think Riot will be able to reverse my account to when I last had access to it? Do you think Riot will also be able to refund my money and refund whatever RP was used after I had access to it (roughly 38k+ RP)?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Riot has a specific department for fraud, as it's around the weekend (And easter!) they may be a little slow in replying, don't be alarmed.

Yes, if your account was indeed compromised all actions taken on the account should be reversed (After the investigation is complete) and your money refunded.

In short, just wait it out. They may be slow to reply but they're the only ones who can help you out.

Thank you sir,

On another note since you're online, I've been having random spikes during the game. It's only been of recent since coming into season 6. I am up around 200-600 ping for about 70% of my games. Is there anything that you can do to assist me with this?

I sure can,

Could you please download [WinMTR](http://downloads.sourceforge.net/project/winmtr/WinMTR-v092.zip) and run a traceroute to the following IP address (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes), export the results as text and reply back with them (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this.)

>103.240.227.5

Could I also get you to run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/) and post back with a link to your results page.

Are you by chance connecting from Asia, specifically HK? Your problems may be being caused by the issue described by Agent Mindstar [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/GYiftAVf-is-anyone-getting-massive-lag-that-wont-stop?comment=00010000).

Uhhhh so here is the pastebin:

http://pastebin.com/RFCxkB1n

Here is the netalyzr:

http://n2.netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/summary/id=36ea240d-5201-16defdcb-2f7b-47e5-a732

No, I'm connecting from Australia.
There's definitely some noticeable packet loss there, you'll have to contact your ISP regarding that.
If I were to call them, what do I ask them about? I have no idea what packet loss is.

Just mention you're experiencing connection issues to the IP listed above and that you believe it's on their end, you want the issue escalated from their basic support teams as they won't be able to do anything. Needs to go to someone who does NOC.
